page.title: 10TREES
page.content: One of the things that makes Barton and the surrounding area attractive is the number of mature trees within this area.In the last year,unfortunately,a lot of trees have had to be felled because of{Dutch Elm Disease.}The places where the felling of trees is noticed most are the park,Stivey Hill and Horkstow Road. The trees which were felled were about 70 feet tall and about 250 years old.The trees which were chopped down were replaced by saplings.They were planted in{National Tree Planting {Week.}The new trees were about 5 years old and 3 feet tall.Some of the new trees have unfortunately been vandalised. The children of area 5 at{Bowmandale {School}have planted,in the school grounds,50 trees that they received from the Forestry Commission.
